title: Trump's border crackdown already delivering results. Will it last?
shortDescription: Illegal crossings at the southern border have declined by over 90% from a year ago.

title: 'All-out war': Trump's clash with the courts intensifies
shortDescription: Frustrated by judicial rulings during his second term, President Trump and allies have lashed out at the courts in a growing pressure campaign.

title: Trump's presidential library plans take off with Eric Trump as pilot
shortDescription: While Trump did not build a physical library after his first term, a future library has a luxury jet and a $37 million commitment from Meta and ABC

title: Trump delivers commencement speech at West Point
shortDescription: President Trump delivered the commencement address at West Point Military Academy in New York.

title: Peace and partnership: 5 takeaways from Trump's West Point speech
shortDescription: The 2025 West Point graduation speech comes at a pivotal time for Trump, who is installing his populist-fueled agenda in the U.S. armed forces

title: Trump's National Security Council slashed amid large-scale firings
shortDescription: More than 100 staff members of the National Security Council were dismissed from their positions, according to reports, in a major overhaul.

title: Republican senators push back over Trump's $46B border wall request
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security wants $45.6 billion to build more border wall.

title: Trump approval rating: Here's what the latest polls show
shortDescription: Polling averages plot a downward trend for the president since early March, and a consistent 44%-45% approval average over the last month.

title: Trump teases more tariffs for phone companies
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to impose 25% tariffs by the end of June on cellphones that Apple and other companies make in other countries.

title: Donald Trump orders nuclear power deregulation
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed a series of executive orders Friday aimed at speeding the development and deployment of nuclear power.

title: Elite colleges are among the biggest losers in Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: The U.S. House of Representatives passed a major tax on university endowments on May 22. Colleges say the measure would slash student financial aid.

title: Trump threatens Apple and EU with tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reignited trade tensions with back-to-back social media posts targeting the European Union and Apple.

title: Trump speaks with presidential seal at crypto dinner billed as private
shortDescription: Trump spoke next to the presidential seal at a dinner for crypto coin investors the White House called a private rather than official event.

title: Lamar Odom booed by hecklers at Trump's crypto dinner
shortDescription: Former NBA player Lamar Odom walked through a throng of booing protesters as he entered a dinner for President Donald Trump's cryptocurrency venture.

title: Trump's tax bill: Impact on Medicaid, SNAP, tax breaks | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump administration says Harvard can no longer enroll international students. Plus, NOAA predicts above average hurricane season. It's on The Excerpt.

title: Harvard says it will fight Trump's foreign student ban
shortDescription: The Trump administration's decision to block Harvard University from enrolling foreigners has caused shock and confusion among students. Harvard called the government's move "unlawful" and said it will fight the ban.

title: Trump threatens bite of Apple, other cellphone makers with 25% tariffs
shortDescription: Trump has repeatedly called on Apple to move manufacturing to US from China, but the company shifted production for more than half its phones to India

title: Judge halts Trump admin from barring Harvard international students
shortDescription: A federal judge halted the Trump administration from revoking Harvard's ability to enroll foreign students just hours after the university sued.

title: Trump threatens 50% tariff on EU, targets iPhones: recap
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reignited trade tensions with his social media posts before the Memorial Day holiday aimed at the European Union and Apple.

title: Trump hosts controversial crypto dinner
shortDescription: The president hosted top investors in his meme coin and rewarded the biggest buyers with gifts worth about $100,000.

title: Trump says major prisoner swap completed between Russia-Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said on Friday that a major prisoner swap was just completed between Russia and Ukraine.

title: 'Harvard refugee': Chinese students seek legal advice after Trump blocks enrollment
shortDescription: Chinese students at Harvard were seeking legal advice after the Trump administration blocked the university from enrolling foreign students.

title: Public schools reject Trump's DEI order. He's coming for their funding
shortDescription: Ivy League colleges aren't the only campuses under fire over DEI initiatives. Now, Trump's orders are taking aim at K-12 public schools.
